meanings.definition: A hairstyle produced by setting the hair in waves or curls and then treating it with chemicals to maintain its shape.
meanings.sent1: She got a perm to make her hair curly.
meanings.sent2: Her perm looked beautiful with the waves.
meanings.sent3: The perm made her hair look like a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: Her perm was like a cascade of curls framing her face.
meanings.sent5: The perm gave her hair a bouncy and lively appearance.

meanings.definition: To give a permanent wave to (hair).
meanings.sent1: She decided to perm her hair for a new look.
meanings.sent2: He perms his hair regularly to keep it curly.
meanings.sent3: Perming her hair always makes her feel like a new person.
meanings.sent4: The hairstylist will perm her hair tomorrow for the event.
meanings.sent5: Perming his hair adds a fun twist to his style.

meanings.definition: A chemical used to give a permanent wave to hair.
meanings.sent1: The hairstylist applied the perm carefully to her hair.
meanings.sent2: She bought a new bottle of perm for her salon.
meanings.sent3: The perm smelled strong but worked wonders on her hair.
meanings.sent4: The perm solution transformed her straight hair into beautiful curls.
meanings.sent5: Using the perm made her hair look stylish and trendy.
